message.body: you're texting... impressive. my day's surprisingly productive. how's yours?
Not so much. Watching the super bowl. How was church? Will i get to see you this week?
is it... going well? (obviously sports talk is not my strong point.) church was good. i'd love to see you this week but i have to work a gallery opening thursday night. :/
Not really. A gallery opening? When are you doing that?
are you at least in good company? it's 6 to 10 on thursday. also working 4-7 friday and 12 to 4 saturday, if there are other times that fit your schedule...
I'm sure i can find sometime that works. Say tuesday?
